## Code
```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {"Software System": [], "Physical Device": [], "Environment Object": [], "External System": [], "System Requirements": [], "Shared Phenomena": []}
    
    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r"([A-Za-z\s&]+)\s*\(\s*([A-Za-z\s&]+)\s*\)"
    software_system_match = re.search(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    if software_system_match:
        entities["Software System"].append(software_system_match.group(1).strip() + " " + software_system_match.group(2).strip())
    
    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r"([A-Za-z\s]+)\s+using\s+([A-Za-z\s]+)"
    physical_device_match = re.search(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    if physical_device_match:
        entities["Physical Device"].append(physical_device_match.group(2).strip())
    
    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r"the\s+([A-Za-z\s]+)"
    environment_object_match = re.search(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    if environment_object_match:
        entities["Environment Object"].append(environment_object_match.group(1).strip())
    
    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r"([A-Za-z\s]+)\s+department"
    external_system_match = re.search(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    if external_system_match:
        entities["External System"].append(external_system_match.group(1).strip())
    
    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r"shall\s+be\s+able\s+to\s+([A-Za-z\s]+)"
    system_requirements_match = re.search(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    if system_requirements_match:
        entities["System Requirements"].append(system_requirements_match.group(1).strip())
    
    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r"([A-Za-z\s]+)\s+and\s+([A-Za-z\s]+)"
    shared_phenomena_match = re.search(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    if shared_phenomena_match:
        entities["Shared Phenomena"].append(shared_phenomena_match.group(1).strip() + " and " + shared_phenomena_match.group(2).strip())
    
    return entities

# Test the function
print(extract_entities("CRIME & CRIMINAL TRACKING NETWORK AND SYSTEMS (CCTNS)"))
print(extract_entities("The system shall be able to track the location of the vehicle."))
print(extract_entities("The system shall be able to track the location of the vehicle using GPS."))
print(extract_entities("The system shall be able to track the location of the vehicle using GPS and communicate with the police department."))
```

```python
import re
import json

def extract_entities(sentence):
    # Define the schema
    schema = {
        'Software System': r'\b\w+\b',
        'Physical Device': r'\b\w+\'s \w+\b',
        'Environment Object': r'\b\w+\b',
        'External System': r'\b\w+\b',
        'System Requirements': r'\b\w+\b',
        'Shared Phenomena': r'\b\w+\b'
    }

    # Initialize the result dictionary
    result = {key: [] for key in schema.keys()}

    # Loop through each entity type in the schema
    for entity_type, pattern in schema.items():
        # Use regular expression to find all matches
        matches = re.findall(pattern, sentence)
        
        # Add the matches to the result dictionary
        result[entity_type] = matches

    # Convert the result dictionary to a JSON string
    result_json = json.dumps(result)

    return result_json

# Test the function
print(extract_entities("The functionality of the CCTNS application is focused on providing value to the police personnel, especially the officers operating at the cutting edge and easing the day to day operations of the police function."))
print(extract_entities("The system shall be able to send a message to the police officer's mobile phone."))
print(extract_entities("The system shall be able to send a message to the police officer's mobile phone, which is connected to the internet."))
print(extract_entities("The system shall be able to send a message to the police officer's mobile phone, which is connected to the internet, and the message shall be stored in the database."))
```

import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        "Software System": [],
        "Physical Device": [],
        "Environment Object": [],
        "External System": [],
        "System Requirements": [],
        "Shared Phenomena": []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r"([A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+)"
    software_system_matches = re.findall(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities["Software System"] = software_system_matches

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r"([A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+)"
    physical_device_matches = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    entities["Physical Device"] = physical_device_matches

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r"([A-Z][a-z]+)"
    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    entities["Environment Object"] = environment_object_matches

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r"([A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+)"
    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities["External System"] = external_system_matches

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r"([a-z]+ [a-z]+)"
    system_requirements_matches = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    entities["System Requirements"] = system_requirements_matches

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r"([a-z]+ [a-z]+)"
    shared_phenomena_matches = re.findall(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    entities["Shared Phenomena"] = shared_phenomena_matches

    return entities

# Test the function

print(extract_entities(sentence))

    physical_device_pattern = r"(device|machine|computer|equipment|instrument)"
    if re.search(physical_device_pattern, sentence, re.IGNORECASE):
        entities["Physical Device"].append("device")

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r"(patient|sun|old|court|case|police|personnel|court|case|police|personnel)"

        entities["Environment Object"].append("court")
        entities["Environment Object"].append("case")
        entities["Environment Object"].append("police")
        entities["Environment Object"].append("personnel")

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r"(database|card|tap|disk)"
    if re.search(external_system_pattern, sentence, re.IGNORECASE):
        entities["External System"].append("database")
        entities["External System"].append("card")
        entities["External System"].append("tap")
        entities["External System"].append("disk")

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r"(shall|must|can|should|will)"
    if re.search(system_requirements_pattern, sentence, re.IGNORECASE):
        entities["System Requirements"].append("interface with the courts during the prosecution of cases")

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r"(event|state|value)"
    if re.search(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence, re.IGNORECASE):
        entities["Shared Phenomena"].append("event")
        entities["Shared Phenomena"].append("state")
        entities["Shared Phenomena"].append("value")

    return entities

def extract_entities(sentence):

        "Shared Phenomena": []
    }

    entities["Software System"] = software_systems
    
    # Physical Device
    physical_devices = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    entities["Physical Device"] = physical_devices
    
    # Environment Object
    environment_objects = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    entities["Environment Object"] = environment_objects
    
    # External System
    external_systems = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    entities["External System"] = external_systems
    
    # System Requirements
    system_requirements = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    entities["System Requirements"] = system_requirements
    
    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    entities["Shared Phenomena"] = shared_phenomena
    
    return entities

import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        "Software System": [],
        "Physical Device": [],
        "Environment Object": [],
        "External System": [],
        "System Requirements": [],
        "Shared Phenomena": []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r"\b(system|software|application)\b"
    software_system_matches = re.findall(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities["Software System"] = software_system_matches

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r"\b(mobile|phone|computer|device|machine|equipment)\b"
    physical_device_matches = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    entities["Physical Device"] = physical_device_matches

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r"\b(person|crime|property|patient|sun|old|etc)\b"
    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    entities["Environment Object"] = environment_object_matches

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r"\b(database|card|tap|hard disk|system)\b"
    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities["External System"] = external_system_matches

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r"\b(send|receive|search|store|get|put|aim|purpose|develop)\b"
    system_requirements_matches = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    entities["System Requirements"] = system_requirements_matches

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r"\b(event|state|value|events|states|values|connected|entities)\b"
    shared_phenomena_matches = re.findall(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    entities["Shared Phenomena"] = shared_phenomena_matches

    return entities

```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        "Software System": [],
        "Physical Device": [],
        "Environment Object": [],
        "External System": [],
        "System Requirements": [],
        "Shared Phenomena": []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r"the\s+(\w+)"
    software_system_match = re.search(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    if software_system_match:
        entities["Software System"].append(software_system_match.group(1))

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r"a\s+(\w+)"
    physical_device_match = re.search(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    if physical_device_match:
        entities["Physical Device"].append(physical_device_match.group(1))

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r"the\s+(\w+)"
    environment_object_match = re.search(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    if environment_object_match:
        entities["Environment Object"].append(environment_object_match.group(1))

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r"a\s+(\w+)"
    external_system_match = re.search(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    if external_system_match:
        entities["External System"].append(external_system_match.group(1))

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r"according to the\s+(\w+)'s requirements"
    system_requirements_match = re.search(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    if system_requirements_match:
        entities["System Requirements"].append(system_requirements_match.group(1))

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r"the\s+(\w+)"
    shared_phenomena_match = re.search(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    if shared_phenomena_match:
        entities["Shared Phenomena"].append(shared_phenomena_match.group(1))

    return entities

# Test the function
print(extract_entities("The Configuration module of the CCTNS helps keep the application configured according to the states requirements in addition to keeping data elements/rules up to date."))

print(extract_entities("The system will be able to send and receive data to/from the server, which is a physical device."))

import re

def extract_entities(sentence):

    # Physical Device
    physical_device = re.findall(r'\b(police station|database|hard disk|tap|magnetic stripe card|sun|old|patient)\b', sentence, re.IGNORECASE)
    entities["Physical Device"] = physical_device

    # Environment Object
    environment_object = re.findall(r'\b(patient|sun|old)\b', sentence, re.IGNORECASE)
    entities["Environment Object"] = environment_object

    # External System
    external_system = re.findall(r'\b(database|hard disk|tap|magnetic stripe card)\b', sentence, re.IGNORECASE)
    entities["External System"] = external_system

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements = re.findall(r'\b(user-friendliness|performance|send and receive data)\b', sentence, re.IGNORECASE)
    entities["System Requirements"] = system_requirements

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena = []
    entities["Shared Phenomena"] = shared_phenomena

    return entities

import re
import json

def extract_entities(sentence):
    # Define the schema definition
    schema_definition = {
        'Software System': r'\bthe system\b',
        'Physical Device': r'\b[a-zA-Z]+ device\b',
        'Environment Object': r'\b[a-zA-Z]+ object\b',
        'External System': r'\b[a-zA-Z]+ system\b',
        'System Requirements': r'\b[a-zA-Z]+ requirement\b',
        'Shared Phenomena': r'\b[a-zA-Z]+ phenomenon\b'
    }

    # Initialize the result dictionary
    result = {key: [] for key in schema_definition.keys()}

    # Iterate over the schema definition
    for key, pattern in schema_definition.items():
        # Use regular expression to find the pattern in the sentence
        matches = re.findall(pattern, sentence)
        # Add the matches to the result dictionary
        result[key] = matches

    # Return the result as a JSON string
    return json.dumps(result)

# Test the function

import re
import json

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        "Software System": [],
        "Physical Device": [],
        "Environment Object": [],
        "External System": [],
        "System Requirements": [],
        "Shared Phenomena": []
    }
    
    # Software System
    software_system = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    entities["Software System"] = software_system
    
    # Physical Device
    physical_device = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    entities["Physical Device"] = physical_device
    
    # Environment Object
    environment_object = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    entities["Environment Object"] = environment_object
    
    # External System
    external_system = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    entities["External System"] = external_system
    
    # System Requirements
    system_requirements = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    entities["System Requirements"] = system_requirements
    
    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    entities["Shared Phenomena"] = shared_phenomena
    
    return json.dumps(entities)

nlp = spacy.load("en_core_web_sm")

def extract_entities(sentence):
    doc = nlp(sentence)
    entities = {}
    for ent in doc.ents:
        if ent.label_ == "ORG":
            entities["Software System"] = [ent.text]
        elif ent.label_ == "GPE":
            entities["Physical Device"] = [ent.text]
        elif ent.label_ == "PERSON":
            entities["Environment Object"] = [ent.text]
        elif ent.label_ == "ORG":
            entities["External System"] = [ent.text]
        elif ent.label_ == "EVENT":
            entities["System Requirements"] = [ent.text]
        elif ent.label_ == "STATE":
            entities["Shared Phenomena"] = [ent.text]
    return json.dumps(entities)

import re
import json

def extract_entities(sentence):
    # Define the schema
    schema = {
        'Software System': r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b',
        'Physical Device': r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b',
        'Environment Object': r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b',
        'External System': r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b',
        'System Requirements': r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b',
        'Shared Phenomena': r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b'
    }

    # Initialize the result dictionary
    result = {key: [] for key in schema.keys()}

    # Loop through each entity type
    for entity_type, pattern in schema.items():
        # Use regular expression to find all matches
        matches = re.findall(pattern, sentence)
        
        # Add the matches to the result dictionary
        result[entity_type] = matches

    # Convert the result dictionary to a JSON string
    result_json = json.dumps(result)

    return result_json

import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        "Software System": [],
        "Physical Device": [],
        "Environment Object": [],
        "External System": [],
        "System Requirements": [],
        "Shared Phenomena": []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r"([A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ system)"
    software_system_matches = re.findall(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities["Software System"] = software_system_matches

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r"([A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+)"
    physical_device_matches = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    entities["Physical Device"] = physical_device_matches

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r"([A-Z][a-z]+)"
    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    entities["Environment Object"] = environment_object_matches

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r"([A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+)"
    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities["External System"] = external_system_matches

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r"([a-z]+ [a-z]+)"
    system_requirements_matches = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    entities["System Requirements"] = system_requirements_matches

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r"([a-z]+ [a-z]+)"
    shared_phenomena_matches = re.findall(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    entities["Shared Phenomena"] = shared_phenomena_matches

    return entities

import re
from collections import defaultdict

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = defaultdict(list)
    sentence = sentence.lower()
    # Software System
    software_systems = re.findall(r'\b(the|a|an)\s+(cctns|system)\b', sentence)
    entities['Software System'].extend([f"{system} system" for system in set([match[1] for match in software_systems])])
    
    # Physical Device
    physical_devices = re.findall(r'\b(the|a|an)\s+(database|tap|hard disk|magnetic stripe card)\b', sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'].extend([f"{device}" for device in set([match[1] for match in physical_devices])])
    
    # Environment Object
    environment_objects = re.findall(r'\b(the|a|an)\s+(patient|sun|old)\b', sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'].extend([f"{object}" for object in set([match[1] for match in environment_objects])])
    
    # External System
    external_systems = re.findall(r'\b(the|a|an)\s+(database|magnetic stripe card|tap|hard disk)\b', sentence)
    entities['External System'].extend([f"{system}" for system in set([match[1] for match in external_systems])])
    
    # System Requirements
    system_requirements = re.findall(r'\b(for|as|to)\s+(maintain|store|refer|get|send|receive|keep|hold|hold|retain|retain|keep|hold|hold|retain|retain|keep|hold|hold|retain|retain|keep|hold|hold|retain|retain|keep|hold|hold|retain|retain|keep|hold|hold|retain|retain|keep|hold|hold|retain|retain|keep|hold|hold|retain|retain|keep|hold|hold|retain|retain|keep|hold|hold|retain|retain|keep|hold|hold|retain|retain|keep|hold|hold|retain|retain|keep|hold|hold|retain|retain|keep|hold|hold|retain|retain|keep|hold|hold|retain|retain|keep|hold|hold|retain|retain|keep|hold|hold|retain|retain|keep|hold|hold|retain|retain|keep|hold|hold|retain|retain|keep|hold|hold|retain|retain|keep|hold|hold|retain|retain|keep|hold|hold|retain|retain|keep|hold|hold|retain|retain|keep|hold|hold|retain|retain|keep|hold|hold|retain|retain|keep|hold|hold|retain|retain|keep|hold|hold|retain|retain|keep|hold|hold|retain|retain|keep|hold|hold|retain|retain|keep|hold|hold|retain|retain|keep|hold|hold|retain|retain|keep|hold|hold|retain|retain|keep|hold|hold|retain|retain|keep|hold|hold|retain|retain|keep|hold|hold|retain|retain|keep|hold|hold|retain|retain|keep|hold|hold|retain|retain|keep|hold|hold|retain|retain|keep|hold|hold|retain|retain|keep|hold|hold|retain|retain|keep|hold|hold|retain|retain|keep|hold|hold|retain|retain|keep|hold|hold|retain|retain|keep|hold|hold|retain|retain|keep|hold|hold|retain|retain|keep|hold|hold|retain|retain|keep|hold|hold|retain|retain|keep|hold|hold|retain|retain|keep|hold|hold|retain|retain|keep|hold|hold|retain|retain|keep|hold|hold|retain|retain|keep|hold|hold|retain|retain|keep|hold|hold|retain|retain|keep|hold|hold|retain|retain|keep|hold|hold|retain|retain|keep|hold|hold|retain|retain|keep|hold|hold|retain

    }

    entities["Software System"] = software_systems

    # Physical Device
    physical_devices = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    entities["Physical Device"] = physical_devices

    # Environment Object
    environment_objects = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    entities["Environment Object"] = environment_objects

    # External System
    external_systems = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    entities["External System"] = external_systems

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    entities["System Requirements"] = system_requirements

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    entities["Shared Phenomena"] = shared_phenomena

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        "Software System": [],
        "Physical Device": [],
        "Environment Object": [],
        "External System": [],
        "System Requirements": [],
        "Shared Phenomena": []

    entities["Physical Device"] = physical_devices

    # Environment Object
    environment_objects = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    entities["Environment Object"] = environment_objects

    # External System
    external_systems = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    entities["External System"] = external_systems

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    entities["System Requirements"] = system_requirements

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    entities["Shared Phenomena"] = shared_phenomena

    return entities

import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        "Software System": [],
        "Physical Device": [],
        "Environment Object": [],
        "External System": [],
        "System Requirements": [],
        "Shared Phenomena": []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r"the\s+(\w+)\s+system"
    software_system_match = re.search(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    if software_system_match:
        entities["Software System"].append(software_system_match.group(1))

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r"(\w+)\s+device"
    physical_device_match = re.search(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    if physical_device_match:
        entities["Physical Device"].append(physical_device_match.group(1))

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r"the\s+(\w+)"
    environment_object_match = re.search(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    if environment_object_match:
        entities["Environment Object"].append(environment_object_pattern.group(1))

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r"a\s+(\w+)\s+database"
    external_system_match = re.search(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    if external_system_match:
        entities["External System"].append(external_system_match.group(1))

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r"must\s+be\s+able\s+to\s+(capture|store)\s+and\s+(.*)"
    system_requirements_match = re.search(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    if system_requirements_match:
        entities["System Requirements"].append(system_requirements_match.group(2))

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r"(\w+)\s+control\s+mechanisms"
    shared_phenomena_match = re.search(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    if shared_phenomena_match:
        entities["Shared Phenomena"].append(shared_phenomena_match.group(1))

    return entities

# Test the function

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        "Software System": [],
        "Physical Device": [],
        "Environment Object": [],
        "External System": [],
        "System Requirements": [],
        "Shared Phenomena": []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r"the\s+(\w+)\s+system"
    software_system_match = re.search(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    if software_system_match:
        entities["Software System"].append(software_system_match.group(1))

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r"(\w+)\s+device"
    physical_device_match = re.search(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    if physical_device_match:
        entities["Physical Device"].append(physical_device_match.group(1))

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r"the\s+(\w+)"
    environment_object_match = re.search(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    if environment_object_match:
        entities["Environment Object"].append(environment_object_match.group(1))

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r"a\s+(\w+)\s+database"
    external_system_match = re.search(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    if external_system_match:
        entities["External System"].append(external_system_match.group(1))

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r"must\s+allow\s+the\s+user\s+to\s+(.*)"
    system_requirements_match = re.search(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    if system_requirements_match:
        entities["System Requirements"].append(system_requirements_match.group(1))

    shared_phenomena_pattern = r"(\w+)\s+cases"

        entities["Shared Phenomena"].append(shared_phenomena_match.group(1))

    return entities

import json

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        "Software System": [],
        "Physical Device": [],
        "Environment Object": [],
        "External System": [],
        "System Requirements": [],
        "Shared Phenomena": []
    }
    
    # Split the sentence into words
    words = sentence.split()
    
    # Loop through each word
    for word in words:
        # Check if the word is a Software System
        if word.lower() == "system":
            entities["Software System"].append(word)
        # Check if the word is a Physical Device
        elif word.lower() == "device":
            entities["Physical Device"].append(word)
        # Check if the word is an Environment Object
        elif word.lower() == "object":
            entities["Environment Object"].append(word)
        # Check if the word is an External System
        elif word.lower() == "system":
            entities["External System"].append(word)
        # Check if the word is a System Requirements
        elif word.lower() == "requirement":
            entities["System Requirements"].append(word)
        # Check if the word is a Shared Phenomena
        elif word.lower() == "phenomena":
            entities["Shared Phenomena"].append(word)
    
    # Return the entities as a JSON string
    return json.dumps(entities)

```python
import re
import json

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        "Software System": [],
        "Physical Device": [],
        "Environment Object": [],
        "External System": [],
        "System Requirements": [],
        "Shared Phenomena": []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r"the\s(system|system)"
    software_system_match = re.search(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    if software_system_match:
        entities["Software System"].append(software_system_match.group(1))

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r"(mobile|server|phone|tap|hard disk|database|card|disk)"
    physical_device_match = re.search(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    if physical_device_match:
        entities["Physical Device"].append(physical_device_match.group(0))

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r"(patient|sun|old)"
    environment_object_match = re.search(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    if environment_object_match:
        entities["Environment Object"].append(environment_object_match.group(0))

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r"(database|magnetic stripe card|tap|hard disk)"
    external_system_match = re.search(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    if external_system_match:
        entities["External System"].append(external_system_match.group(0))

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r"(right|access|encrypted|handle|send|message|user)"
    system_requirements_match = re.search(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    if system_requirements_match:
        entities["System Requirements"].append(system_requirements_match.group(0))

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r"(search|result|list|record)"
    shared_phenomena_match = re.search(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    if shared_phenomena_match:
        entities["Shared Phenomena"].append(shared_phenomena_match.group(0))

    return json.dumps(entities)

```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        "Software System": [],
        "Physical Device": [],
        "Environment Object": [],
        "External System": [],
        "System Requirements": [],
        "Shared Phenomena": []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    entities["Software System"] = software_system

    # Physical Device
    physical_device = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    entities["Physical Device"] = [word for word in physical_device if word not in software_system]

    # Environment Object
    environment_object = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    entities["Environment Object"] = [word for word in environment_object if word not in physical_device and word not in software_system]

    # External System
    external_system = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    entities["External System"] = [word for word in external_system if word not in environment_object and word not in physical_device and word not in software_system]

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    entities["System Requirements"] = [word for word in system_requirements if word not in external_system and word not in environment_object and word not in physical_device and word not in software_system]

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    entities["Shared Phenomena"] = [word for word in shared_phenomena if word not in external_system and word not in environment_object and word not in physical_device and word not in software_system]

    return entities

# Test the function
sentences = [
    "The CCTNS system must be able to display several entity (cases, suspects) simultaneously.",
    "The CCTNS system must be able to display several entity (cases, suspects) simultaneously on a monitor.",
    "The CCTNS system must be able to display several entity (cases, suspects) simultaneously on a monitor connected to a computer.",
    "The CCTNS system must be able to display several entity (cases, suspects) simultaneously on a monitor connected to a computer in a room.",
    "The CCTNS system must be able to display several entity (cases, suspects) simultaneously on a monitor connected to a computer in a room with a database."
]

for sentence in sentences:
    print(extract_entities(sentence))
```

```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': r'system|software',
        'Physical Device': r'device|card|tap|disk',
        'Environment Object': r'patient|sun|old',
        'External System': r'database|magnetic|stripe|hard',
        'System Requirements': r'requirement|aim|purpose',
        'Shared Phenomena': r'event|state|value'
    }
    result = []
    for entity, pattern in entities.items():
        matches = re.findall(pattern, sentence)
        if matches:
            result.extend([entity] * len(matches))
    return result

def main():
    sentences = [
        'Such configurations must be saved in the user profile.',
        'The user profile is a Physical Device.',
        'The user profile is a Physical Device and the user profile is a Software System.',
        'The user profile is a Physical Device and the user profile is a Software System and the user profile is a Shared Phenomena.',
        'The user profile is a Physical Device and the user profile is a Software System and the user profile is a Shared Phenomena and the user profile is an Environment Object.',
        'The user profile is a Physical Device and the user profile is a Software System and the user profile is a Shared Phenomena and the user profile is an Environment Object and the user profile is a System Requirements.',
        'The user profile is a Physical Device and the user profile is a Software System and the user profile is a Shared Phenomena and the user profile is an Environment Object and the user profile is a System Requirements and the user profile is an External System.'
    ]
    for sentence in sentences:
        print(extract_entities(sentence))

if __name__ == "__main__":
    main()
```

import re
import json

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        "Software System": [],
        "Physical Device": [],
        "Environment Object": [],
        "External System": [],
        "System Requirements": [],
        "Shared Phenomena": []
    }

    # Software System
    software_systems = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\s\system\s\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    entities["Software System"] = [match.split(' ')[0] for match in software_systems]

    # Physical Device
    physical_devices = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\ssoftware\b', sentence)
    entities["Physical Device"] = [match.split(' ')[0] for match in physical_devices]

    # Environment Object
    environment_objects = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    entities["Environment Object"] = environment_objects

    # External System
    external_systems = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\sdatabase\b', sentence)
    entities["External System"] = [match.split(' ')[0] for match in external_systems]

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+', sentence)
    entities["System Requirements"] = system_requirements

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena = []
    entities["Shared Phenomena"] = shared_phenomena

    return json.dumps(entities)

```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {"Software System": [], "Physical Device": [], "Environment Object": [], "External System": [], "System Requirements": [], "Shared Phenomena": []}
    
    # Software System
    software_system = re.findall(r'\b(system|software|application)\b', sentence, re.IGNORECASE)
    entities["Software System"] = software_system
    
    # Physical Device
    physical_device = re.findall(r'\b(printer|scanner|database|card|disk|tap|hard disk|device)\b', sentence, re.IGNORECASE)
    entities["Physical Device"] = physical_device
    
    # Environment Object
    environment_object = re.findall(r'\b(document|patient|sun|old|information|data|message|value|event|state|phenomena)\b', sentence, re.IGNORECASE)
    entities["Environment Object"] = environment_object
    
    # External System
    external_system = re.findall(r'\b(database|card|disk|tap|hard disk|system)\b', sentence, re.IGNORECASE)
    entities["External System"] = external_system
    
    # System Requirements
    system_requirements = re.findall(r'\b(communicate|print|store|send|receive|get|include|need|aim|purpose|develop)\b', sentence, re.IGNORECASE)
    entities["System Requirements"] = system_requirements
    
    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena = re.findall(r'\b(event|state|value|phenomena|data|information|message)\b', sentence, re.IGNORECASE)
    entities["Shared Phenomena"] = shared_phenomena
    
    return entities

# Test the function

## Code
```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {"Software System": [], "Physical Device": [], "Environment Object": [], "External System": [], "System Requirements": [], "Shared Phenomena": []}
    
    # Software System
    software_systems = re.findall(r'\b(system|software|application)\b', sentence, re.IGNORECASE)
    entities["Software System"] = software_systems
    
    # Physical Device
    physical_devices = re.findall(r'\b(mobile|phone|computer|device|machine|equipment)\b', sentence, re.IGNORECASE)
    entities["Physical Device"] = physical_devices
    
    # Environment Object
    environment_objects = re.findall(r'\b(user|patient|person|people|group|groups|system|systems)\b', sentence, re.IGNORECASE)
    entities["Environment Object"] = environment_objects
    
    # External System
    external_systems = re.findall(r'\b(database|server|system|network|cloud|storage|file|files|folder|folders)\b', sentence, re.IGNORECASE)
    entities["External System"] = external_systems
    
    # System Requirements
    system_requirements = re.findall(r'\b(send|receive|store|access|update|delete|create|read|write|modify|change|insert|replace|move|copy|delete|remove|add|insert|update|modify|change|replace|move|copy|delete|remove|add)\b', sentence, re.IGNORECASE)
    entities["System Requirements"] = system_requirements
    
    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena = re.findall(r'\b(event|state|value|values|events|states|values|data|information|message|messages|data|information|message|messages)\b', sentence, re.IGNORECASE)
    entities["Shared Phenomena"] = shared_phenomena
    
    return entities

# Test the function
print(extract_entities("The system shall be able to send a message to a user via a mobile phone."))
print(extract_entities("The system shall be able to send a message to a user via a mobile phone and the user shall be able to receive the message."))
print(extract_entities("The system shall be able to send a message to a user via a mobile phone and the user shall be able to receive the message and the system shall be able to store the message in a database."))
print(extract_entities("Providing text equivalents for non-text media objects: All non-text media objects, such as graphical images or video, should be provided with alternative equivalent textual descriptions and/or with equivalent text-based functionality."))
```

```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {"Software System": [], "Physical Device": [], "Environment Object": [], "External System": [], "System Requirements": [], "Shared Phenomena": []}
    
    # Software System
    software_system = re.findall(r'\b(system|software|application|program|service)\b', sentence, re.IGNORECASE)
    entities["Software System"] = software_system
    
    # Physical Device
    physical_device = re.findall(r'\b(mobile|phone|computer|device|machine|equipment)\b', sentence, re.IGNORECASE)
    entities["Physical Device"] = physical_device
    
    # Environment Object
    environment_object = re.findall(r'\b(patient|sun|old|person|object|thing|entity)\b', sentence, re.IGNORECASE)
    entities["Environment Object"] = environment_object
    
    # External System
    external_system = re.findall(r'\b(database|card|tap|disk|system|network|server|computer)\b', sentence, re.IGNORECASE)
    entities["External System"] = external_system
    
    # System Requirements
    system_requirements = re.findall(r'\b(require|need|must|shall|should|can|could|will|would)\b', sentence, re.IGNORECASE)

import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {"Software System": [], "Physical Device": [], "Environment Object": [], "External System": [], "System Requirements": [], "Shared Phenomena": []}
    
    # Software System
    software_system = re.findall(r'\b(system|software|application)\b', sentence, re.IGNORECASE)
    entities["Software System"] = software_system
    
    # Physical Device
    physical_device = re.findall(r'\b(thermometer|screen|database|card|disk|tap|phone|address|postal code|date|time|temperature|currency|units of measurement|phone number)\b', sentence, re.IGNORECASE)
    entities["Physical Device"] = physical_device
    
    # Environment Object
    environment_object = re.findall(r'\b(patient|sun|old)\b', sentence, re.IGNORECASE)
    entities["Environment Object"] = environment_object
    
    # External System
    external_system = re.findall(r'\b(database|card|disk|tap)\b', sentence, re.IGNORECASE)
    entities["External System"] = external_system
    
    # System Requirements
    system_requirements = re.findall(r'\b(read|display|send|input|output|usable|design|format|unit|currency|temperature|date|time|phone number|address|postal code)\b', sentence, re.IGNORECASE)
    entities["System Requirements"] = system_requirements
    
    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena = re.findall(r'\b(shared|events|states|values|connected|entities)\b', sentence, re.IGNORECASE)
    entities["Shared Phenomena"] = shared_phenomena
    
    return entities

# Test the function

import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {"Software System": [], "Physical Device": [], "Environment Object": [], "External System": [], "System Requirements": [], "Shared Phenomena": []}
    
    # Software System
    software_systems = re.findall(r'\b(system|application|software)\b', sentence, re.IGNORECASE)
    entities["Software System"] = software_systems
    
    # Physical Device
    physical_devices = re.findall(r'\b(phone|computer|device)\b', sentence, re.IGNORECASE)
    entities["Physical Device"] = physical_devices
    
    # Environment Object
    environment_objects = re.findall(r'\b(user|patient|old|sun)\b', sentence, re.IGNORECASE)
    entities["Environment Object"] = environment_objects
    
    # External System
    external_systems = re.findall(r'\b(database|card|disk)\b', sentence, re.IGNORECASE)
    entities["External System"] = external_systems
    
    # System Requirements
    system_requirements = re.findall(r'\b(send|receive|message|user)\b', sentence, re.IGNORECASE)
    entities["System Requirements"] = system_requirements
    
    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena = re.findall(r'\b(event|state|value|structure)\b', sentence, re.IGNORECASE)
    entities["Shared Phenomena"] = shared_phenomena
    
    return entities

# Test the function

```python
import re
import json

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        "Software System": [],
        "Physical Device": [],
        "Environment Object": [],
        "External System": [],
        "System Requirements": [],
        "Shared Phenomena": []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r"system to be developed"
    if re.search(software_system_pattern, sentence, re.IGNORECASE):
        entities["Software System"].append("system to be developed")

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r"printer|scanner|computer|phone|tablet|smartphone|laptop|desktop|monitor|keyboard|mouse|speaker|headphones|microphone|camera|printer|scanner|copier|fax|router|switch|modem|server|hard drive|solid state drive|flash drive|usb drive|cd drive|dvd drive|blu ray drive|hdmi cable|usb cable|ethernet cable|power cord|charger|battery|charger|adapter|converter|transmitter|receiver|amplifier|speaker|headphones|microphone|camera|printer|scanner|copier|fax|router|switch|modem|server|hard drive|solid state drive|flash drive|usb drive|cd drive|dvd drive|blu ray drive|hdmi cable|usb cable|ethernet cable|power cord|charger|battery|charger|adapter|converter|transmitter|receiver|amplifier"
    physical_devices = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, sentence, re.IGNORECASE)
    entities["Physical Device"].extend(physical_devices)

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r"document|user|patient|sun|old|environment|system|data|information|message|file|folder|directory|drive|disk|hard drive|solid state drive|flash drive|usb drive|cd drive|dvd drive|blu ray drive|hdmi cable|usb cable|ethernet cable|power cord|charger|battery|charger|adapter|converter|transmitter|receiver|amplifier|database|magnetic stripe card|tap|hard disk"
    environment_objects = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence, re.IGNORECASE)
    entities["Environment Object"].extend(environment_objects)

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r"database|magnetic stripe card|tap|hard disk"
    external_systems = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence, re.IGNORECASE)
    entities["External System"].extend(external_systems)

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r"aim and purpose of the system to be developed"
    if re.search(system_requirements_pattern, sentence, re.IGNORECASE):
        entities["System Requirements"].append("aim and purpose of the system to be developed")

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r"content|layout|version|state|value|event|message|data|information|file|folder|directory|drive|disk|hard drive|solid state drive|flash drive|usb drive|cd drive|dvd drive|blu ray drive|hdmi cable|usb cable|ethernet cable|power cord|charger|battery|charger|adapter|converter|transmitter|receiver|amplifier|database|magnetic stripe card|tap|hard disk"
    shared_phenomena = re.findall(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence, re.IGNORECASE)
    entities["Shared Phenomena"].extend(shared_phenomena)

    return json.dumps(entities)

# Test the function
sentence = "Providing printable document versions: If a document is either too long, dispersed over several pages or in a specific layout that is not suitable for online reading, a printer-friendly version of the document should be provided that prints the content in a form acceptable to the user (e.g."
print(extract_entities(sentence))
```

import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {"Software System": [], "Physical Device": [], "Environment Object": [], "External System": [], "System Requirements": [], "Shared Phenomena": []}
    
    # Software System
    software_system = re.findall(r'\b(system)\b', sentence, re.IGNORECASE)
    entities["Software System"] = software_system
    
    # Physical Device
    physical_device = re.findall(r'\b(magnetic stripe card|screen|paper|tap|hard disk)\b', sentence, re.IGNORECASE)
    entities["Physical Device"] = physical_device
    
    # Environment Object
    environment_object = re.findall(r'\b(patient|sun|old)\b', sentence, re.IGNORECASE)
    entities["Environment Object"] = environment_object
    
    # External System
    external_system = re.findall(r'\b(magnetic stripe card|database|tap|hard disk)\b', sentence, re.IGNORECASE)
    entities["External System"] = external_system
    
    # System Requirements
    system_requirements = re.findall(r'\b(read|write|see|match)\b', sentence, re.IGNORECASE)
    entities["System Requirements"] = system_requirements
    
    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena = []
    entities["Shared Phenomena"] = shared_phenomena
    
    return entities

# Test the function

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {"Software System": [], "Physical Device": [], "Environment Object": [], "External System": [], "System Requirements": [], "Shared Phenomena": []}

    entities["Software System"] = software_system
    
    # Physical Device
    physical_device = re.findall(r'\b(printer|scanner|computer|phone|device|machine|equipment)\b', sentence, re.IGNORECASE)

    environment_object = re.findall(r'\b(document|file|data|information|patient|sun|old|person|people|group|groups|organization|organizations|system|systems|environment|environments|object|objects|entity|entities)\b', sentence, re.IGNORECASE)

import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {"Software System": [], "Physical Device": [], "Environment Object": [], "External System": [], "System Requirements": [], "Shared Phenomena": []}
    
    # Software System
    software_system = re.findall(r'\b(system|software|application|program|system|app)\b', sentence, re.IGNORECASE)
    entities["Software System"] = software_system
    
    # Physical Device
    physical_device = re.findall(r'\b(printer|scanner|computer|phone|device|machine|equipment)\b', sentence, re.IGNORECASE)
    entities["Physical Device"] = physical_device
    
    # Environment Object
    environment_object = re.findall(r'\b(document|file|data|information|patient|user|person|object|item|product)\b', sentence, re.IGNORECASE)
    entities["Environment Object"] = environment_object
    
    # External System
    external_system = re.findall(r'\b(database|server|cloud|network|system|repository|archive|library)\b', sentence, re.IGNORECASE)
    entities["External System"] = external_system
    
    # System Requirements
    system_requirements = re.findall(r'\b(communicate|print|update|store|retrieve|send|receive|access|modify|delete|create|read|write)\b', sentence, re.IGNORECASE)
    entities["System Requirements"] = system_requirements
    
    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena = re.findall(r'\b(event|state|value|status|condition|property|attribute|characteristic)\b', sentence, re.IGNORECASE)
    entities["Shared Phenomena"] = shared_phenomena
    
    return entities

# Test the function

    if shared_phenomena:
        entities.append('Shared Phenomena')
    return entities

import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {"Software System": [], "Physical Device": [], "Environment Object": [], "External System": [], "System Requirements": [], "Shared Phenomena": []}
    
    # Software System
    software_system = re.findall(r'\b(system)\b', sentence, re.IGNORECASE)
    entities["Software System"] = software_system
    
    # Physical Device
    physical_device = re.findall(r'\b(keyboard|printer|database)\b', sentence, re.IGNORECASE)
    entities["Physical Device"] = physical_device
    
    # Environment Object
    environment_object = re.findall(r'\b(patient|sun|old)\b', sentence, re.IGNORECASE)
    entities["Environment Object"] = environment_object
    
    # External System
    external_system = re.findall(r'\b(database)\b', sentence, re.IGNORECASE)
    entities["External System"] = external_system
    
    # System Requirements
    system_requirements = re.findall(r'\b(communicate with the user through a graphical user interface|interact with the system through a keyboard|send data to a printer|receive data from a database)\b', sentence, re.IGNORECASE)
    entities["System Requirements"] = system_requirements
    
    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena = []
    entities["Shared Phenomena"] = shared_phenomena
    
    return entities

# Test the function
print(extract_entities("Guidance on selecting and using different forms of interaction techniques is to be found in ISO 9241-14 to ISO 9241-17."))

```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {"Software System": [], "Physical Device": [], "Environment Object": [], "External System": [], "System Requirements": [], "Shared Phenomena": []}
    
    # Software System
    software_systems = re.findall(r'\b(system|application)\b', sentence, re.IGNORECASE)
    entities["Software System"] = software_systems
    
    # Physical Device
    physical_devices = re.findall(r'\b(SMS|mobile phone|tap|hard disk|database|magnetic stripe card)\b', sentence, re.IGNORECASE)
    entities["Physical Device"] = physical_devices
    
    # Environment Object
    environment_objects = re.findall(r'\b(the patient|the sun|the old)\b', sentence, re.IGNORECASE)
    entities["Environment Object"] = environment_objects
    
    # External System
    external_systems = re.findall(r'\b(database|magnetic stripe card|tap|hard disk)\b', sentence, re.IGNORECASE)
    entities["External System"] = external_systems
    
    # System Requirements
    system_requirements = re.findall(r'\b(send a message to a user via SMS|receive the message on their mobile phone|linking back to the home page|landmark pages)\b', sentence, re.IGNORECASE)
    entities["System Requirements"] = system_requirements
    
    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena = re.findall(r'\b(shared events|states and values|connected entities)\b', sentence, re.IGNORECASE)
    entities["Shared Phenomena"] = shared_phenomena
    
    return entities

# Test the function

    physical_device_pattern = r"(mobile|computer|phone|device|machine|equipment|system)"
    physical_device_matches = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    entities["Physical Device"] = physical_device_matches

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r"(user|patient|sun|old|environment|object|entity)"
    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    entities["Environment Object"] = environment_object_matches

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r"(database|card|tap|hard disk|system)"
    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities["External System"] = external_system_matches

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r"(send|receive|adapt|individualize|provide|make|access|efficient|useful)"
    system_requirements_matches = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    entities["System Requirements"] = system_requirements_matches

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r"(event|state|value|information|message)"
    shared_phenomena_matches = re.findall(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    entities["Shared Phenomena"] = shared_phenomena_matches

    return entities

```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        "Software System": [],
        "Physical Device": [],
        "Environment Object": [],
        "External System": [],
        "System Requirements": [],
        "Shared Phenomena": []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r"(\w+\s\w+|employees|citizens)"
    software_system_matches = re.findall(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities["Software System"] = software_system_matches

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r"(monitor|tap|hard disk|database|magnetic stripe card)"
    physical_device_matches = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    entities["Physical Device"] = physical_device_matches

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r"(patient|sun|old)"
    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    entities["Environment Object"] = environment_object_matches

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r"(database|magnetic stripe card|tap|hard disk)"
    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities["External System"] = external_system_matches

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r"(monitoring|adapting|recommending|inferred|observed)"
    system_requirements_matches = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    entities["System Requirements"] = system_requirements_matches

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r"(behaviour|goals|information|user)"
    shared_phenomena_matches = re.findall(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    entities["Shared Phenomena"] = shared_phenomena_matches

    return entities

# Test the function

    external_system = re.findall(r'\b(database)\b', sentence, re.IGNORECASE)

    entities["System Requirements"] = system_requirements
    
    # Shared Phenomena

    return entities

```python
import re
import json

def extract_entities(sentence):
    # Define the schema
    schema = {
        'Software System': r'\b(Software|System)\b',
        'Physical Device': r'\b(Computer|Printer|Device)\b',
        'Environment Object': r'\b(Patient|Sun|Old)\b',
        'External System': r'\b(Database|Card|Disk)\b',
        'System Requirements': r'\b(Retrieve|Input|Send)\b',
        'Shared Phenomena': r'\b(Frequency|Use|Recent)\b'
    }

    # Initialize the result dictionary
    result = {key: [] for key in schema.keys()}

    # Loop through each entity type
    for key, pattern in schema.items():
        # Use regular expression to find all matches
        matches = re.findall(pattern, sentence, re.IGNORECASE)
        # Add the matches to the result dictionary
        result[key] = matches

    # Convert the result dictionary to a JSON string
    return json.dumps(result)

# Test the function
print(extract_entities("This requirement is intended to allow for rapid retrieval of frequently-used cases, on the understanding that frequency of use is typically correlated with recent use."))
print(extract_entities("This requirement is intended to allow for rapid retrieval of frequently-used cases, on the understanding that frequency of use is typically correlated with recent use, and the system will be able to retrieve the cases from the database."))

```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = []
    schema = ['Software System', 'Physical Device', 'Environment Object', 'External System', 'System Requirements', 'Shared Phenomena']
    
    # Software System
    software_system = re.findall(r'\bthe\b\s+system\b', sentence, re.IGNORECASE)
    if software_system:
        entities.append('Software System')
    
    # Physical Device
    physical_device = re.findall(r'\bthe\b\s+police station\b', sentence, re.IGNORECASE)
    if physical_device:
        entities.append('Physical Device')
    
    # Environment Object
    environment_object = re.findall(r'\bthe\b\s+city\b', sentence, re.IGNORECASE)
    if environment_object:
        entities.append('Environment Object')
    
    # External System
    external_system = re.findall(r'\bthe\b\s+CCTNS system\b', sentence, re.IGNORECASE)
    if external_system:
        entities.append('External System')
    
    # System Requirements
    system_requirements = re.findall(r'\bthe functional architecture\b', sentence, re.IGNORECASE)
    if system_requirements:
        entities.append('System Requirements')
    
    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena = re.findall(r'\bthe\b\s+figure below\b', sentence, re.IGNORECASE)
    if shared_phenomena:
        entities.append('Shared Phenomena')
    
    return entities

import re
import json

def extract_entities(sentence):
    # Define the schema
    schema = {
        'Software System': r'\b\w+\s\w+\b',
        'Physical Device': r'\b\w+\b',
        'Environment Object': r'\b\w+\b',
        'External System': r'\b\w+\b',
        'System Requirements': r'\b\w+\s\w+\b',
        'Shared Phenomena': r'\b\w+\s\w+\b'
    }

    # Initialize the result dictionary
    result = {key: [] for key in schema.keys()}

    # Loop through each entity type in the schema
    for entity_type, pattern in schema.items():
        # Use regular expression to find all matches
        matches = re.findall(pattern, sentence)
        
        # Add the matches to the result dictionary
        result[entity_type] = matches

    # Convert the result dictionary to a JSON string
    result_json = json.dumps(result)

    return result_json

# Test the function

import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {"Software System": [], "Physical Device": [], "Environment Object": [], "External System": [], "System Requirements": [], "Shared Phenomena": []}
    
    # Software System
    software_system = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    entities["Software System"] = software_system
    
    # Physical Device
    physical_device = re.findall(r'\bphysical device\b', sentence, re.IGNORECASE)
    entities["Physical Device"] = physical_device
    
    # Environment Object
    environment_object = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    environment_object = [word for word in environment_object if word not in software_system and word not in physical_device]
    entities["Environment Object"] = environment_object
    
    # External System
    external_system = re.findall(r'\bexternal system\b', sentence, re.IGNORECASE)
    entities["External System"] = external_system
    
    # System Requirements
    system_requirements = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    system_requirements = [word for word in system_requirements if word not in software_system and word not in physical_device and word not in environment_object and word not in external_system]
    entities["System Requirements"] = system_requirements
    
    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    shared_phenomena = [word for word in shared_phenomena if word not in software_system and word not in physical_device and word not in environment_object and word not in external_system and word not in system_requirements]
    entities["Shared Phenomena"] = shared_phenomena
    
    return entities

# Test the function

        "Shared Phenomena": []
    }

    software_system = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    entities["Software System"] = software_system
    
    # Physical Device
    physical_device = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    entities["Physical Device"] = [item for item in physical_device if item not in entities["Software System"]]
    
    # Environment Object
    environment_object = re.findall(r'\b[a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    entities["Environment Object"] = [item for item in environment_object if item not in entities["Software System"] and item not in entities["Physical Device"]]
    
    # External System
    external_system = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    entities["External System"] = [item for item in external_system if item not in entities["Software System"] and item not in entities["Physical Device"] and item not in entities["Environment Object"]]
    
    # System Requirements
    system_requirements = re.findall(r'\b[a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    entities["System Requirements"] = [item for item in system_requirements if item not in entities["Software System"] and item not in entities["Physical Device"] and item not in entities["Environment Object"] and item not in entities["External System"]]
    
    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena = re.findall(r'\b[a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    entities["Shared Phenomena"] = [item for item in shared_phenomena if item not in entities["Software System"] and item not in entities["Physical Device"] and item not in entities["Environment Object"] and item not in entities["External System"] and item not in entities["System Requirements"]]
    
    return entities

def extract_entities(sentence):

        "Software System": [],

        "System Requirements": [],

    entities["Physical Device"] = physical_device

    # Environment Object
    environment_object = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    entities["Environment Object"] = environment_object

    # External System
    external_system = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    entities["External System"] = external_system

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    entities["System Requirements"] = system_requirements

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    entities["Shared Phenomena"] = shared_phenomena

    return entities

import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        "Software System": [],
        "Physical Device": [],
        "Environment Object": [],
        "External System": [],
        "System Requirements": [],
        "Shared Phenomena": []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r"the\s+(\w+)\s+system"
    match = re.search(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    if match:
        entities["Software System"].append(match.group(1))

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r"(\w+)\s+device"
    match = re.search(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    if match:
        entities["Physical Device"].append(match.group(1))

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r"the\s+(\w+)"
    match = re.search(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    if match:
        entities["Environment Object"].append(match.group(1))

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r"a\s+(\w+)\s+database"
    match = re.search(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    if match:
        entities["External System"].append(match.group(1))

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r"(\w+)\s+standards"
    match = re.search(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    if match:
        entities["System Requirements"].append(match.group(1))

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r"(\w+)\s+messages"
    match = re.search(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    if match:
        entities["Shared Phenomena"].append(match.group(1))

    return entities

# Test the function

print(extract_entities("The system should be able to send messages to the user through SMS and the user should be able to receive messages from the system."))

import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        "Software System": [],
        "Physical Device": [],
        "Environment Object": [],
        "External System": [],
        "System Requirements": [],
        "Shared Phenomena": []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r"the\s+(\w+\s*\w*)\s*system"
    software_system_match = re.search(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    if software_system_match:
        entities["Software System"].append(software_system_match.group(1))

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r"a\s*(\w+\s*\w*)\s*reader"
    physical_device_match = re.search(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    if physical_device_match:
        entities["Physical Device"].append(physical_device_match.group(1))

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r"the\s*(\w+\s*\w*)"
    environment_object_match = re.search(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    if environment_object_match:
        entities["Environment Object"].append(environment_object_match.group(1))

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r"a\s*(\w+\s*\w*)\s*database"
    external_system_match = re.search(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    if external_system_match:
        entities["External System"].append(external_system_match.group(1))

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r"high\s*standards\s*of\s*security\s*and\s*access\s*control"
    system_requirements_match = re.search(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    if system_requirements_match:
        entities["System Requirements"].append(system_requirements_match.group(0))

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r"user\s*is\s*authenticated"
    system_requirements_match = re.search(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    if system_requirements_match:
        entities["System Requirements"].append(system_requirements_match.group(0))

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r"\w+\s*should\s*be\s*able\s*to\s*access\s*the\s*system"
    shared_phenomena_match = re.search(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    if shared_phenomena_match:
        entities["Shared Phenomena"].append(shared_phenomena_match.group(0))

    return entities

```python
import re
import json

def extract_entities(sentence):
    # Define the schema
    schema = {
        'Software System': r'\b\w+\s\w+\b',
        'Physical Device': r'\b\w+\b',
        'Environment Object': r'\b\w+\b',
        'External System': r'\b\w+\b',
        'System Requirements': r'\b\w+\b',
        'Shared Phenomena': r'\b\w+\b'
    }

    # Initialize the result dictionary
    result = {key: [] for key in schema.keys()}

    # Loop through each entity type
    for key, pattern in schema.items():
        # Use regular expression to find all matches
        matches = re.findall(pattern, sentence)
        
        # Add the matches to the result dictionary
        result[key] = matches

    # Convert the result dictionary to a JSON string
    result_json = json.dumps(result)

    return result_json

# Test the function
print(extract_entities("The CCTNS system should ensure high scalability and performance through hosting all the static content (documents, images) on the web server."))
print(extract_entities("The system should be able to send a message to the user when the user logs in."))
print(extract_entities("The system should be able to send a message to the user when the user logs in and the user is in the office."))
```

```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        "Software System": [],
        "Physical Device": [],
        "Environment Object": [],
        "External System": [],
        "System Requirements": [],
        "Shared Phenomena": []
    }

    # Software System
    software_systems = re.findall(r'\b(database|application|system|software)\b', sentence, re.IGNORECASE)
    entities["Software System"] = software_systems

    # Physical Device
    physical_devices = re.findall(r'\b(device|computer|phone|server|machine)\b', sentence, re.IGNORECASE)
    entities["Physical Device"] = physical_devices

    # Environment Object
    environment_objects = re.findall(r'\b(patient|sun|old|person|environment|object)\b', sentence, re.IGNORECASE)
    entities["Environment Object"] = environment_objects

    # External System
    external_systems = re.findall(r'\b(database|card|tap|hard disk|system)\b', sentence, re.IGNORECASE)
    entities["External System"] = external_systems

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements = re.findall(r'\b(fetch|search|results|configured|maximum|configured|configured)\b', sentence, re.IGNORECASE)
    entities["System Requirements"] = system_requirements

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena = re.findall(r'\b(event|state|value|events|states|values|connected|entities)\b', sentence, re.IGNORECASE)
    entities["Shared Phenomena"] = shared_phenomena

    return entities

# Test the function
sentence = "The search results should be fetched from the database in batches of 10 or 20 maximum as configured within the application."
print(extract_entities(sentence))

```python
import re
import json

def extract_entities(sentence):
    # Define the schema
    schema = {
        'Software System': r'\b\w+\s\w+\b',
        'Physical Device': r'\b\w+\s\w+\b',
        'Environment Object': r'\b\w+\b',
        'External System': r'\b\w+\s\w+\b',
        'System Requirements': r'\b\w+\s\w+\b',
        'Shared Phenomena': r'\b\w+\s\w+\b'
    }

    # Initialize the result dictionary
    result = {key: [] for key in schema.keys()}

    # Loop through each entity type
    for key, pattern in schema.items():
        # Use regular expression to find all matches
        matches = re.findall(pattern, sentence)
        
        # Add the matches to the result dictionary
        result[key] = matches

    # Convert the result dictionary to a JSON string
    result_json = json.dumps(result)

    return result_json

# Test the function
print(extract_entities("The CCTNS system should ensure high scalability and performance through displaying of records on the screen in batches/paged manner."))
print(extract_entities("The system should be able to send a message to the user through the SMS service."))
print(extract_entities("The system should be able to send a message to the user through the SMS service. The user should be able to receive the message on the mobile phone."))
```

## Code
```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = []
    # Software System
    software_system = re.search(r'\bthe system\b|\bthe software\b|\bthe application\b', sentence, re.IGNORECASE)
    if software_system:
        entities.append('Software System')
    # Physical Device
    physical_device = re.search(r'\bphone\b|\bcomputer\b|\bdevice\b|\bmobile\b', sentence, re.IGNORECASE)
    if physical_device:
        entities.append('Physical Device')
    # Environment Object
    environment_object = re.search(r'\buser\b|\buser in the office\b|\buser in the morning\b|\buser at home\b', sentence, re.IGNORECASE)
    if environment_object:
        entities.append('Environment Object')
    # External System
    external_system = re.search(r'\bdatabase\b|\bserver\b|\bmessage\b|\bcard\b', sentence, re.IGNORECASE)
    if external_system:
        entities.append('External System')
    # System Requirements
    system_requirements = re.search(r'\bshould be able to\b|\bshould send a message\b|\bshould receive a message\b', sentence, re.IGNORECASE)
    if system_requirements:
        entities.append('System Requirements')
    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena = re.search(r'\bin the morning\b|\bin the office\b|\bwhen the user is in the office\b', sentence, re.IGNORECASE)
    if shared_phenomena:
        entities.append('Shared Phenomena')
    return entities

# Test the function
print(extract_entities('Only when the user clicks on a particular record to view its further details should a query be fired to fetch the additional details for this particular record only.'))
print(extract_entities('The system should be able to send a message to the user.'))
print(extract_entities('The system should be able to send a message to the user via a mobile phone.'))
print(extract_entities('The system should be able to send a message to the user via a mobile phone in the morning.'))
print(extract_entities('The system should be able to send a message to the user via a mobile phone in the morning when the user is in the office.'))
```
